text: Evangelina Elizondo (28 April 1929 – October 2, 2017) was a Mexican actress, writer, painter and singer. She was born in Mexico City. She was known for her roles in Frontera Norte, El Castillo de los Monstrous, and in A Walk in the Clouds. She was also a singer known for "La sensacional Evangelina" and writer who wrote Pensamiento abierto. Elizondo died in Mexico City on October 2, 2017 at the age of 88.Muere la actriz Evangelina Elizondo a los 88 años ==References== ==Other websites== * Elizondo's paintings * Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican painters Category:Mexican writers Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Singers from Mexico City
title: Evangelina Elizondo
